Hey folks, is there a way to specify fields when defining the default constructor on a struct. I have a relatively long struct for my default settings (like 15 fields).

```struct MyStruct
   field1::Int64
   field2::Float64
   field3::Float64
end

MyStruct() = do
   field1 = 5
   field2 = 2.0
   field3 = 4.0
end ```
I think right now I just have to put everything in order in the constructor, like `MyStruct() = MyStruct(5, 2.0, 4.0)`, but that can easily create problems if there are a lot of settings. Just figured I would ask if there is an easier way. I could used a namedtuple, but started with using structs, so wanted to be consistent. But it is probably a good thing to know if something like this is possible.
